p: The participants were then visited after 12 to 14 weeks to administer the follow-up questionnaire as well as collect NP/OP swabs if the participant had ARI at the time of follow-up. Pig exposure was defined as cleaning barns, feeding, or slaughtering pigs as part of routine daily activities (> 3 times a week) for the month preceding the study interview. Poultry exposure was similarly defined for those working with poultry.
